And when this is done, come and render an offering unto the Lord. It says to your own soul, Christ for my sake became poor that through His 


                                     -224- 

poverty I might be made rich. Jesus, by the offering of Himself, has brought this infinite Gift within our reach. You may bring a gift to Jesus that through your offerings others may go out in the vineyard and work to bring to God those for whom Jesus died.
